summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Admin User Management and Image Generator file attachment features for Kurdynowski accounting blog application

integration_issues.issue: Could not fully test image generator file attachment UI - requires article editor access
integration_issues.note: Backend API for reference_image works correctly, but UI testing was limited by navigation complexity

passed_tests: Backend: Admin login with Monika returns is_admin=true
Backend: GET /api/admin/users returns user list with article counts
Backend: POST /api/admin/users creates new user successfully
Backend: PUT /api/admin/users/{id} updates user role (admin toggle)
Backend: Non-admin users get 403 when accessing admin endpoints
Backend: POST /api/images/generate accepts reference_image field with base64 data
Backend: Image generation validates MIME types and rejects invalid types
Frontend: Admin user login shows 'ADMINISTRACJA' section in sidebar
Frontend: Admin user sees 'Uzytkownicy' link under admin section
Frontend: Admin login displays 'ADMIN' badge in user profile
Frontend: Non-admin users do NOT see 'ADMINISTRACJA' section
Frontend: Non-admin users do NOT see admin links or badges
Frontend: Direct navigation to /admin/users redirects to auth for non-authenticated users

success_percentage.backend: 100% - All admin API endpoints working correctly
success_percentage.frontend: 90% - Admin authorization UI working, image generator UI partially tested
